WorkItem.Description:
From thread:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=52271
 
MS Office Excel is apparently able to read an Excel file even if it is defect and CODEPAGE record is located in worksheet stream instead of workbook stream. But PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 can not. Sample file attached generated by 3rd-party application.
 
To mimic behavior of MS Office Excel, in this work item we change the behavior of Excel5 reader so CODEPAGE record defaults to CP1252 when missing.
WorkItem.Summary: Ability to read defect BIFF5 Excel file without CODEPAGE record
